monster.name: Cthurkey
monster.languages: understands Common, Deep Speech, and Undercommon but doesn't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The cthurkey can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The chturkey has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the cthurkey must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the cthurkey's Stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cthurkey attacks with its tentacles. If that attack succeeds, it can make one attack with its bite on the same turn. It can only bite Grappled targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the chturkey can't constrict another target.
